name: Jigsaw Puzzle Free .
description:
Welcome to the best Jigsaw game for iOS:Jigsaw Puzzle
An interesting and fun jigsaw puzzle, support from the local load images to generate a new puzzle box also supports a variety of shapes.

Features：
( 1) support from local, album or camera image dynamically generates the pieces of a jigsaw puzzle
( 2) the number of fragments can be customized
( 3 ) double or twin refers to distort the picture of the picture rotation
( 4) the automatic memory game, next opened automatically continue last game.

Get ready for the most realistic puzzle experience on iOS!

欢迎您使用最佳益智拼图游戏:拼图也疯狂
特点：
（1）支持从本地、相册或者相机加载图像动态的生成拼图碎片
（2）可以自定义碎片数目
（3）双击或者双指扭曲图片可以对图片进行旋转
（4）自动记忆游戏进度，下次打开自动继续上次游戏。
